{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3306345,"name":"Niran Schneller","username":"NiranSchneller","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/niranschneller/{size}/212122_2.png","created_at":"2024-02-10T16:02:30.882Z","cooked":"

Hello everyone!
I know that in theory, the Kraken and falcon motors should work with phoenix pro. But, I want to make that no teams have had problems with them. So - have any teams experienced problems with these motors and phoenix pro?

Thanks in advance!

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":3,"updated_at":"2024-02-10T16:02:30.882Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":14,"reads":71,"readers_count":70,"score":84.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":454176,"topic_slug":"krakens-and-falcons-with-phoenix-pro","display_username":"Niran Schneller","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":59907,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"3339 Software Lead Alumni"},"post_url":"/t/krakens-and-falcons-with-phoenix-pro/454176/1","custom_user_title":"3339 Software Lead Alumni","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3306349,"name":"","username":"manso","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/m/e99b99/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-02-10T16:06:23.148Z","cooked":"

from our experience we haven’t had any problems with them yet, all we had to do was:

  1. Connect the motors to the robot
  2. Update the firmware/configurations

Note that we got them like 2 days ago, and we tested them yesterday.
